trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a list that is displayed when the user clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 사용자가 클릭할 때 표시 되는 목록에서 단일 항목을 선택할 수 있게 하는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref> and ToolStripDropDown replace and add functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"> </xref> ToolStripDropDown 바꾸고 기능을 추가 하 고는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> 이전 버전의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> 선택 하는 경우 이전 버전과 호환성을 유지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripDropDown to display drop-down lists of options, such as a color picker.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripDropDown를 사용 하 여 색 선택 등의 옵션의 드롭다운 목록을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable item reordering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opacity*> of the form can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opacity*>폼의 조정 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opacity*>

trans-unit.source: This property is meaningful only when UI effects are enabled on the host operating system.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 UI 효과가 호스트 운영 체제에서 사용 되는 경우에 의미가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property value when UI effects are disabled has no effect.
trans-unit.target: UI 효과 사용할 수 없는 속성 값을 변경 해도 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opacity*> of the form can be adjusted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opacity*>양식의 수 조정 된 없으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opacity*>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> values.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control should automatically close when it has lost activation.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 활성화 손실 된 경우에 자동으로 컨트롤 닫아야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> that always stays open, set AutoClose to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 원하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>유지 되며 항상 열고, AutoClose 설정 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Consider handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> event instead of setting the AutoClose property.
Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> field in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> handler to specify custom closing logic.
trans-unit.target: 검사는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>필드에 프로그램 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>닫는 사용자 지정 논리를 지정 하는 처리기.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control automatically closes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> automatically adjusts its size when the form is resized.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control automatically resizes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 닫습니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 지정된 된 원인에 대 한 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Close method to close a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control under specific conditions, such as when an application is started or an item is selected by clicking the control, if the focus changes, or if specified keyboard action occurs.
trans-unit.target: Close 메서드를 사용 하 여를 닫으려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>키보드 동작이 발생 하는 응용 프로그램이 시작 되 또는 포커스가 변경 또는 지정 된 경우 컨트롤을 클릭 하 여 항목을 선택 하는 경우와 같은 특정 조건에서 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason"></xref> values.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is closed.
When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 만들 때 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 식별 대리자를 실행 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하려면 대리자의 인스턴스 이벤트에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 제거 하지 않으면 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

Creates a handle for the control.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref> values.

The possibilities are <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>.
Gets parameters of a new window.

You can override the CreateParams property to add extra functionality to inheriting classes, but you must first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> method of the base class to verify that the control continues to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 클래스를 상속 하는 추가 기능을 추가할 CreateParams 속성을 재정의할 수 있지만 먼저 호출 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>컨트롤 계속 제대로 작동 하는지 확인 하기 위해 기본 클래스의 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> used when creating a new window.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 개체 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> 새 창을 만들 때 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the docking location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, indicating which borders are docked to the container.
trans-unit.target: 도킹 위치를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>를 나타내는 컨테이너에 도킹 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
The default is Top.
Gets or sets the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 방향을 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 상대적으로 표시 됩니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"></xref> values.
Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 내부 간격의 콘텐츠를 픽셀 단위로 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value of `(0, 0, 1, 0)`.
Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 도구 설명에 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 기본적으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수가 true 이면이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnClosed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClosed 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Determines the opacity of the form.
This can only be set on top-level controls.
The level of opacity for the form.
The default is 1.00.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is opened.
When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 만들 때 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 식별 대리자를 실행 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하려면 대리자의 인스턴스 이벤트에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 제거 하지 않으면 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control is opening.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The ToolStripItem that is the overflow button for a ToolStrip with overflow enabled.
trans-unit.target: 오버플로가 활성화 된 ToolStrip에 대 한 오버플로 단추인의 ToolStripItem입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that is the owner of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that is the owner of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Processes a dialog box character.
The character to process.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤이 문자를 처리 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box keys, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 탭, 리턴, 이스케이프 문자인 및 화살표 키 같은 대화 상자 키를 처리 하기 위해 메시지를 전처리 하는 동안 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 경우에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>메서드 컨트롤이 키를 처리 하지 않는다는 것을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: 관련이 부모의 문자를 단순히 보냅니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드나 반환 `false` 컨트롤 부모가 없는 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>클래스 대화 상자 키의 실제 처리를 수행 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 컨트롤은 ActiveX 컨트롤 또는 Windows Forms 응용 프로그램에서 호스트 되는 경우에 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> 처리할 키를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤이 키를 처리 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 컨트롤의 니모닉 문자를 처리할 수 있도록 지정 합니다. 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 결정 해야 컨트롤을 니모닉 처리 하는 상태에 있는지 여부와 지정 된 문자를 니모닉 나타내는지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우,이 메서드는 수행 돌아가 니모닉와 연결 된 동작 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 구현에서는 자주 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>메서드를 지정 된 문자는 컨트롤의 텍스트에 니모닉과 일치 하는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 의 기본 구현을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>메서드는 반환 `false` 컨트롤에 니모닉이 없음을 나타내려면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤이 문자를 니모닉으로 처리 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window region associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 창 영역을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The window <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> associated with the control.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Region*> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: 오른쪽에서 왼쪽으로 쓰는 글꼴을 사용 하는 로캘을 지원 하도록 컨트롤 요소가 정렬 되어 있는지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 위치, 크기, 안쪽 여백 및 여백을 조정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 너비와 높이 크기를 조정 하는 인수.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 크기와 위치를 정의할 때 사용할 컨트롤의 범위를 지정 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.

Adjusts the size of the owner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to accommodate the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> if the owner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is currently displayed, or clears and resets active <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> child controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 소유자의 크기를 조정 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> 에 맞게는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 경우 소유자 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> 현재 표시 또는 지우고 활성으로 다시 설정 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 컨트롤의 자식 컨트롤이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> 현재 표시 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the owner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is currently displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 소유자 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> 현재 표시 되 고, 그러지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control in its default position.
Positions the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> relative to the specified screen location.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 지정한 화면 위치를 기준으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal and vertical location of the screen's upper-left corner, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 픽셀 단위로 화면의 왼쪽 위 모퉁이의 가로 및 세로 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Positions the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> relative to the specified control location and with the specified direction relative to the parent control.
